Episodes.Title: Don't Ever F**king Miss
Episodes.Writer: Jake Adelstein, J.T. Rogers, Brad Kane
Episodes.Actors: Ansel Elgort, Ken Watanabe, Rachel Keller
Episodes.Plot: As Jake, Katagiri, and Samantha pursue the truth about Polina, Sato clings to life--but not all of Chihara-kai are hoping for his full recovery.

Episodes.Title: Be My Number One
Episodes.Writer: Jake Adelstein, J.T. Rogers, Karl Taro Greenfeld
Episodes.Actors: Ansel Elgort, Ken Watanabe, Rachel Keller
Episodes.Plot: As Jake and Katagiri seek new meaning at work, Samantha confronts a thief in her club, and Chihara-kai welcome a returning member.

Episodes.Title: Old Law, New Twist
Episodes.Writer: Jake Adelstein, J.T. Rogers, Francine Volpe
Episodes.Actors: Ansel Elgort, Ken Watanabe, Rachel Keller
Episodes.Plot: Katagiri and Nagata ramp up their efforts. Jake gets invited to an exclusive party. Samantha and Sato deal with a growing problem at the club.

Episodes.Title: Illness of the Trade
Episodes.Writer: Jake Adelstein, J.T. Rogers, Adam Stein
Episodes.Actors: Ansel Elgort, Ken Watanabe, Rachel Keller
Episodes.Plot: After a disastrous setback, Sato and Hayama strategize a way forward. Jake and Katagiri pursue their target--and try not to land in his crosshairs.

Episodes.Title: The War at Home
Episodes.Writer: Jake Adelstein, J.T. Rogers, Brad Kane
Episodes.Actors: Ansel Elgort, Ken Watanabe, Rachel Keller
Episodes.Plot: A death at Chihara-kai causes upheaval. Jake makes a long overdue visit home. Katagiri hopes a perp will help break his case wide open.
